modName: Empowered Cloacks - Based on Cloaks of Skyrim
summary: You love "Cloaks of Skyrim" but think some of the special ones deserved a enchantment?
descriptionHtml:
The WHY:
After find some unique in very hard places the first think was "this one must be awesome because the one in the cabin was great",
after find a normal cloak with new textures and common stats. Thinking
the mod is WIP I wait, and wait, and wait, but nothing change.
The mod is great, no discuss about that, but some enchants like the Red Eagle one are always a nice surprise.
So I decide to add the enchants myself, in my lack of skill I cannot find a
way to add more than one enchant to the most difficult cloaks but I
find the archmage robes have some nice ones and clone these.



01 - Merged changes in USLEEP

02 - Merged Dawnguard (one less ESP), replace both ESP with EMPOWERED

03 - Compressed textures in BSA - Optional

04 - Add enchants to certain cloacks

Original powers:
Cape of the Red Eagle - One Handed +40% damage

Greybeard Mantle - Shout time -20%

Nyartuk's Mantle - Two Handed +25% damage

On Warm Sands - Muffle effect

Shroud of the Grey Fox - Sneaking +25%

The Fall of Winterhold - Magicka +60

Vermina's Devotion - Conjuration -20% casting


Ver 0.8

All done. Now its balance time :p
Log as the full list of changes in XEdit language.

0.9 Find a book removed by USLEEP in leveled list. (Book2CommonVernaccusandBourlor "Vernaccus and Bourlor" [BOOK:0001B27A])
Still testing V.08.
author: Belcanzor
